item.title: 天气预示丰收，大豆跌至三年新低
item.description: 大豆价格跌至三年来的新低，原因是美国中西部较干旱地区的降雨前景有助于平息新出现的对潜在减产的担忧。【原文：Soybean prices plunged to a fresh three-year low as the outlook for rain in drier parts of the US Midwest helped quell emerging concerns about potential yield losses.】

item.title: Ocado 计划自 2021 年以来首次从债券市场借款
item.description: Ocado Group Plc 正在寻求出售近三年来的首笔债券，而在此之前几周，这家机器人仓库供应商刚刚报告称其亏损已经收窄。【原文：Ocado Group Plc is looking to sell its first bonds in nearly three years, a couple of weeks after the provider of robotic warehouses reported that it had narrowed its losses.】

item.title: 拜登政府购买近 500 万桶石油以补充储备
item.description: 拜登政府周一宣布，已为国家紧急储备库购买了 465 万桶原油，以继续补充枯竭的储备。【原文：The Biden administration announced Monday it has purchased 4.65 million barrels of crude oil for the nation’s emergency cache as it continues refilling the depleted reserve.】

item.title: 深海采矿的未来取决于一场有争议的选举
item.description:
一个籍籍无名的联合国下属机构的下一任领导人将帮助决定一个寻求从海底提取电动汽车电池金属的潜在数十亿美元产业的命运。【原文：

The next leader of an obscure, UN-affiliated agency will help determine the fate of a potentially multibillion-dollar industry seeking to extract EV battery metals from the seabed.

】

item.title: 以太 ETF 交易首周流出 3.4 亿美元
item.description: 持有以太坊加密货币的九种美国 ETF 在交易的第一周就出现了 3.4 亿美元的资金外流，因为投资者每天都要从一种转为交易所交易基金的高收费传统产品中撤出资金。【原文：The nine US ETFs holding the Ethereum cryptocurrency saw outflows of $340 million during their first week of trading as investors pulled money daily from a high-fee legacy product that was converted to an exchange-traded fund.】

item.title: 马杜罗的下一步行动是关键，美国和巴西质疑他的胜利
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro）正试图摆脱国际社会对他宣布委内瑞拉大选获胜的怀疑，所有的目光都转向了他如何积极回应反对派声称他窃取选举的说法。【原文：Nicolás Maduro is trying to ride out international skepticism about his declaration of victory in Venezuela, with all eyes turning to how aggressively he responds the opposition’s claim he stole the election.】

item.title: 受制裁影响，俄罗斯北极液化天然气二厂削减运行至五个月最低水平
item.description: 在美国制裁限制了出口选择之后，俄罗斯最大的液化天然气生产商于 6 月份将其北极液化天然气 2 号设施的加工量降至 2 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s biggest producer of liquefied natural gas in June cut processing at its Arctic LNG 2 facility to the lowest level since February, after US sanctions curtailed export options.】

item.title: 英国取消向英国公众出售 NatWest 股份的计划
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）认为，向公众出售英国国家银行（NatWest Group Plc）63 亿英镑（80 亿美元）股份的计划并不划算。【原文：The UK won’t pursue a plan to sell some of its £6.3 billion ($8 billion) stake in NatWest Group Plc to the public, after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves concluded it didn’t provide value for money.】

item.title: 道富证券的 Marvin Loh 预计明年 10 年期收益率为 5.25
item.description:
降息的光芒可能会被国债销售时间表的现实所抹杀

The glow of rate cuts may get wiped out by the reality of the government bond sale schedule

item.title: 英国广播公司前主持人休-爱德华兹（Huw Edwards）被控拍摄儿童猥亵图像
item.description: 伦敦警察局表示，英国广播公司前主持人休-爱德华兹（Huw Edwards）被指控制作儿童不雅图像。【原文：Former BBC presenter Huw Edwards has been charged with making indecent images of children, the Metropolitan Police said.】

item.title: 高管在调查中表示，墨西哥比以前更安全了
item.description: 根据墨西哥美国商会的一份新报告，在墨西哥运营的公司中有更大比例对安全问题持积极态度。【原文：A larger share of companies operating in Mexico are feeling positive about security, according to a new report from the American Chamber of Commerce of Mexico.】

item.title: 布伦特原油自 6 月以来首次跌破每桶 80 美元
item.description: 受算法交易和世界第一大石油进口国中国需求低迷迹象的影响，布伦特原油自 6 月 10 日以来首次跌破每桶 80 美元。【原文：Brent crude slumped below $80 a barrel for the first time since June 10, driven by algorithmic trading and signs of poor demand from China, the world’s top oil importer.】

item.title: 危地马拉今年首次利用全球债券市场
item.description: 在贝尔纳多-阿雷瓦洛总统的新政府领导下，危地马拉今年首次进入国际资本市场。【原文：Guatemala is tapping the international capital markets for the first time this year under the new administration of President Bernardo Arevalo.】

item.title: 美国机械制造商申请破产，归咎于中国监管机构
item.description: 为汽车和航空航天工业制造金属加工机床的 Hardinge 公司申请破产，原因是中国监管机构阻止了该公司出售其在中国业务的计划。【原文：Hardinge Inc., which makes metal-working machines for the automotive and aerospace industries, filed bankruptcy, blaming Chinese regulators who stalled the company’s plans to sell its operations in the country.】

item.title: Netflix 举行投资者电话会议，可能发行首只蓝筹债券
item.description: Netflix 公司将于周一就其潜在的首次高等级债券销售向投资者发出邀请。【原文：Netflix Inc. is sounding out investors on Monday for its potential first high-grade bond sale.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的 Zentner 将领导新的全球投资团队
item.description: 摩根士丹利首席美国经济学家 Ellen Zentner 即将离职，领导该行投资部门新成立的团队。【原文：Morgan Stanley chief US economist Ellen Zentner is leaving her post to lead a newly created team within the bank’s investment wing.】

item.title: 利润大增后，维托尔向交易商支付 65 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 维托尔集团（Vitol Group）去年派发了 65 亿美元的创纪录股息，这是能源危机给全球大宗商品贸易商带来巨大财富的最新证明。【原文：Vitol Group paid a record dividend of $6.5 billion last year, the latest evidence of how the energy crisis has delivered spectacular riches to the world’s commodity traders.】

item.title: 第六街、姆努钦将以 51 亿美元收购保险公司 Enstar
item.description: 以 Sixth Street 为首的投资集团同意以 51 亿美元收购财产和意外保险公司 Enstar Group Ltd.，这是今年第二大私募股权支持的保险交易。【原文：An investor group led by Sixth Street agreed to buy property and casualty insurer Enstar Group Ltd. for $5.1 billion, in the second-largest private equity backed insurance deal of the year.】

item.title: 津巴布韦企业获得 4 亿美元银行支持，拓展非洲市场
item.description: 一位高级官员说，非洲进出口银行已拨出 4 亿美元，用于帮助希望在非洲大陆拓展业务的津巴布韦公司。【原文：The African Export-Import Bank has set aside $400 million to help Zimbabwean companies that want to expand their operations on the continent, a senior official said.】

item.title: NBF 称 Fiera 股票涨势过猛，下调其评级
item.description: Fiera Capital Corp. 的股价今年一路飙升，但加拿大国家银行的一位分析师认为，该股的上涨空间已经所剩无几。【原文：Fiera Capital Corp. shares have been on a surge this year, but a National Bank of Canada analyst argues that the stock has little left by way of upside.】

item.title: 美国寻求切断与中国关系，药明康德销售额下降
item.description: 药明康德公司（WuXi AppTec Co.【原文：WuXi AppTec Co. reported shrinking sales as it continues to grapple with a looming US bill seeking to cut ties with Chinese biotechnology companies.】

item.title: 可可创 4 个月新低，因需求疲软、供应增加的前景不明
item.description: 可可期货跌至四个多月来的最低点，因为交易商们正在权衡下一季供应量的增加与需求疲软的前景。【原文：Cocoa futures fell to the lowest in more than four months as traders weigh improved supply in the next season against the prospects of weaker demand.】

item.title: 发行商在关键事件发生前踊跃参与欧洲初选
item.description: 周一，欧洲一级市场的债务销售步伐迅猛，因为在一系列重要的央行政策决定、财报和美国数据发布之前，企业都在寻求提前融资。【原文：Debt sales in Europe’s primary market were at a brisk pace on Monday as companies sought to front-load their financings ahead of a slew of major central bank policy decisions, earnings reports and US data releases.】

item.title: 国债攀升，将创三年来最长连胜纪录
item.description: 国债上涨拉开了本周全球债券市场多事之秋的序幕，美债有望连续第三个月上涨，这将是三年来最长的涨势。【原文：Treasuries are rising to kick off an eventful week in global bond markets, putting US debt on track for a third-straight month of gains in what would be the longest rally in three years.】

item.title: 垃圾借款人急于进入市场，推出数十亿新产品
item.description: 周一，包括皇家加勒比游轮和海洋世界在内的一系列垃圾级发行人启动了债务销售，借款人试图利用信贷市场的强劲势头。【原文：A spate of junk-rated issuers including Royal Caribbean Cruises and Seaworld kicked off debt sales Monday as borrowers seek to take advantage of a strong tone in the credit market.】

item.title: 德国太阳能发电量再创新高
item.description: 德国不断扩大的太阳能电池板阵列创下了新的发电纪录，因为可再生能源取代了更为昂贵的化石燃料，在电力输出中占据了更大的份额。【原文：Germany’s expanding array of solar panels set a new generation record as renewables take a larger share of power output from more expensive fossil fuels.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 通过出售纳斯达克股权融资 27 亿美元
item.description: Thoma Bravo 出售其在纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo raised $2.7 billion in a sale of about half of its shares in Nasdaq Inc. as it sells down the stake it acquired as part of a transaction last year.】

item.title: 出售斯塔维利后，纽卡斯尔联队价值飙升至 10 亿英镑
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在沙特老板通过购买前老板阿曼达-斯塔维利（Amanda Staveley）的股份增持纽卡斯尔联队后，纽卡斯尔联队目前的估值已超过 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）。【原文：Newcastle United is now valued at over £1 billion ($1.3 billion), after its Saudi owners increased its holding by buying former owner Amanda Staveley’s stake, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Stonegate 利用 TDR 提供的 2.5 亿英镑开始债务再融资
item.description: 英国最大的酒馆运营商 Stonegate Pubs 将通过出售债券和私募股权所有者 TDR Capital 的 2.5 亿英镑现金注资，开始大规模债务再融资。【原文：Stonegate Pubs, the UK’s biggest pub operator, is starting a large debt refinancing with a bond sale and a £250 million cash injection from its private equity owner TDR Capital.】

item.title: 反对派质疑马杜罗获胜，委内瑞拉债券下滑
item.description: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）被宣布在反对派誓言挑战的选举中获胜后，委内瑞拉债券周一下跌，加剧了这个南美国家新的政治紧张局势。【原文：Venezuela bonds fell on Monday after President Nicolas Maduro was declared the winner in an election the opposition vowed to challenge, fueling fresh political tension in the South American nation.】
